[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] More Furniture is a small mod that adds about a dozen new items into Rimworld. It was created so you'd have more variety when choosing things to fill your colonist's rooms with. Originally created by Anonemous2, development continued by me.
[strike]ROYALTY PATCH: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2020784345[/strike] No longer needed
[h1] Contains[/h1]
Several End Tables New Lights A New Dresser More Chairs A modular Couch A Tiny Table Kichen/Bar Counters A File Cabinet Several New Plant Pots Four New Carpet Colors to match the default beds
[h1] Compatibility[/h1]
More Furniture can be safely added into existing saves, But all new items should be deleted before disabling the mod. Does not require any other mods to work, and it should be compatible with most other mods.
[u]Patches have been added to make the following mods fully compatible:[/u] - Rimkea - Vanilla Furniture Expanded
[strike]Royalty compatibility patch found here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2020784345[/strike] No longer needed
[h1] Translations[/h1]
Currently supports translations into German, Polish, French, Chinese, and Russian, but if someone requests another language, I can add it in too. (Beware, translations were done with a online translator and maybe abit funky, If you want to help/or comment on a translations, use the Translations discussion.)
[h1] If you'd like to see something added in, feel free to make a suggestion.
If you have any problems, please let me know in the comments.[/h1]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active.
